message:
Dear Citizen,
 Your complaint for {complaint_type} has been submitted with ID {id} on {date}. You can track your complaint status on the mSeva Punjab mobile App (download here - {download link}) or your local municipal web portal.

EGOVS

Dear Citizen,
 Your complaint for {complaint_type} with ID {id} submitted on {date} has been rejected. Reason for Rejection: {additional_comments} If you wish to re-open the complaint, you can download the mSeva Punjab mobile app (download here - {download link}) or visit your local municipal website.

EGOVS

Dear Citizen, Your complaint for {complaint_type} with ID {id} submitted on {date} has been assigned to {emp_name}, {emp_designation}, {emp_department}. You can track your complaint status and connect with our officials on the on the mSeva Punjab mobile App (download here - {download_link}) or your local municipal web portal.

EGOVS

Shri {emp_name}, Complaint for '{complaint_type}' with ID {id} has been assigned to you. Please take appropriate action. {ao_designation} - {ulb}

EGOVS

{emp_name} has commented on your complaint for {complaint_type} with complaint ID {id}. Comment - {comment}.

EGOVS

Your complaint has been {status}. You can track your complaint status on the mSeva app or your local government web portal

EGOVS

Dear Citizen, Your complaint for {complaint_type} with ID {id} submitted on {date} has been re-assigned to {emp_name}, {emp_designation}, {emp_department}. You can track your complaint status and connect with our officials on the on the mSeva Punjab mobile App (download here - {download_link}) or your local municipal web portal.

EGOVS

Shri {emp_name}, Complaint for '{complaint_type}' with ID {id} has been re-assigned as per your request. {ao_designation} - {ulb}

EGOVS

Dear Citizen, Your complaint for {complaint_type} with ID {id} submitted on {date} has been rejected. Reason for Rejection: {reason}, Additional Comments: {additional_comments} If you wish to re-open the complaint, you can download the mSeva Punjab mobile app (download here - {download_link}) or visit your local municipal website.

EGOVS

Dear Citizen, Your complaint for {complaint_type} with ID {id} submitted on {date} has been RE-OPEN as per your request. You can track your complaint status and connect with our officials on the mSeva Punjab mobile App (download here - {download_link}) or your local municipal web portal.

EGOVS

Shri {emp_name}, Complaint for {complaint_type} with ID {id} has been re-opened by the citizen. It is being reviewed by Assigning officer - {ulb}.

EGOVS

Shri {emp_name}, Complaint for {complaint_type} with ID {id} has received {rating}/5 feedback from the citizen. Thank you for your service.

EGOVS
